title: Electric Planes Are Coming Sooner Than You Think

title: On the Strange, Artistic World of Marfa, Texas
excerpt: I used to think Marfa was a kind of practical joke that West Texans were playing on cultural elites. It’s remote even for Texas. The nearest airports are in El Paso and Carlsbad, New Mexico, each 2…
